info.title: CarsXE
info.description: CarsXE provides vehicle specs, market value, license plate decoding, history and image search. Get robust vehicle specification data on selections, attributes, equipment, colors, recalls, warranties, and photos.

get.description: Retrieve data including attributes, color options, equipment details, recall information, warranties, and photos.
Retrieves estimate of the market value for used and new cars by VIN based on millions of historical vehicle sales stored in CarsXE's sales database.

get.description: Retrieve a comprehensive set of history records for used and new cars by VIN based on millions of historical vehicle sales stored in CarsXE's sales database.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The country. Only for use with Australian states.

get.description: Retrieves a library of vehicle's data based on the vehicle's registration/license plate number and state. The state is a two letter abbreviation, with international support also for Australia, Brazil, United Kingdom, Ireland, Italy, Spain, India, Mexico and New Zealand.

hostPageDomainFriendlyName.description: The host page domain friendly name.
hostPageDomainFriendlyName.title: Host Page Domain Friendly Name

get.description: Retrieves photos of vehicles based on their make and model, plus other optional parameters

post.description: Retrieves accurate recognition of license plates from images, based on training from license plates from over 100 countries and states.

get.description: Retrieve code information from a library of over 3000 OBD codes and their matching vehicle diagnosis.
